name: Red Frontier Noir
description: An elegant, darker twist on the Red Frontier featuring rye whiskey, black cherry, bitters and cranberry â€“ rich, deep and refined.
flavorProfile: Smoky, subtly sweet and deep-fruity with mild bitterness and an aromatic cherry finish.
instructions: Fill a tumbler with crushed ice.
Add rye whiskey, cranberry juice, black cherry syrup and grenadine.
Garnish with a black cherry and a mint sprig.
